title: FS: Double Folder Bresnahan/Huggins RAW (price drop)

posts.post_title: FS: Double Folder Bresnahan/Huggins RAW (price drop)
posts.post_content:
T201 Mecca Double Folder Bresnahan/Huggins - $180/OBO

Card is in excellent condition.  Two slightly soft corners, two sharp corners; edges are crisp.  It comes in a four-screw Lucite holder (purchased this way and never removed).  There is no paper loss (bits of residue on back is on Lucite holder, not card).  Good color and registry.  If you have any questions please PM or email me at acowan19(at)gmail(dot)com.
